title: Open-source System.Xaml
body: An open-source version of System.Xaml would provide the .NET community with an expressive, extensible, tool-friendly, and fairly mature framework for the creation of sophisticated object graphs.

comments.body: A company like Microsoft should not take a language or development tool away from its users.
